name: Shooting Range (WIP)
description:
In this shooting range demo you can customize your character and attempt to set high scores on 5 different course layouts.
Choose your layout and try and get the perfect run. 
Then let us know your best times.  We would love to see what you get. :)

This is just a glimpse at our third person character being built for our open world tactical shooter. 
If you would like to learn more check out our Facebook and Patreon page.
https://www.patreon.com/mistysixgames
https://www.facebook.com/MistySixGames
